summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 1994 CHEVROLET S-10.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE CONTINUES TO BLOW THE FUSES TO THE MAIN IGNITION POWER SOURCE OF THE COIL.  THE DEALER COULD NOT DETERMINE THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE; HOWEVER, THEY REPAIRED THE VEHICLE INCORRECTLY.  THE CONTACT REPAIRED THE VEHICLE HIMSELF BY INSTALLING A PLASTIC PIPE IN THE ENGINE.  HE CALLED THE DEALER BACK, AND THEY LAUGHED.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 104,000.
